messages.subject: SAMURAI SWORD MURDERS IN GERMANY
messages.msgSnippet: Dear Brethren, One doesn t like to be partisan in the face of such tragedy, but I do wonder if German reporting is the same as here in Australia - i.e., a
messages.messageBody:
Dear Brethren,

One doesn't like to be partisan in the face of such tragedy, but I do wonder
if German reporting is the same as here in Australia - i.e., a "samurai"
sword is mostly a dreadful repro...
http://news.ninemsn.com.au/world/853392/baby-survives-camp-site-family-bloodbath

Barry Thomas.
